industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Join the Fud community as a Walmart Creator Expert and Mentor, and help others navigate the world of online selling on Walmart. Fud is the world's first social hustling community, dedicated to equipping people with the knowledge and skills to succeed in their side hustles. As a Walmart Creator Expert and Mentor, you'll play a crucial role in supporting and guiding our community members on their Walmart selling journey.

Whether you're an experienced Walmart seller or have a deep understanding of the online retail industry, this is an exciting opportunity to share your expertise and help others reach their goals.

Join the Fud community to monetize your free time and let it become your next favorite side hustle. Our community encompasses content creators, freelancers, independent workers, gig workers, resellers & thrifters, entrepreneurs, solopreneurs, and small business owners.

You can experience our community for yourself by downloading our free to use app.

Responsibilities

  • Provide guidance and mentoring to individuals looking to start or grow their Walmart selling business
  • Offer support and share best practices for optimizing product listings, managing inventory, and driving sales on the Walmart platform
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, policies, and strategies related to Walmart selling
  • Create educational resources such as videos, articles, and live streams to share knowledge and insights
  • Engage with community members through forums, group discussions, and one-on-one interactions
  • Cultivate a positive and collaborative community environment


Requirements

  • Proven experience and success as a Walmart seller or deep understanding of the online retail industry
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to effectively convey complex concepts
  • Passion for helping others succeed and a genuine interest in mentoring and guiding individuals
  • Knowledge of Walmart's online marketplace, including best practices for product optimization, inventory management, and sales growth
  • Ability to stay up-to-date with the latest trends, policies, and strategies related to Walmart selling
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively
  • Familiarity with digital tools and platforms, including social media and video creation/editing software
  • Proactive and self-motivated with the ability to work independently and manage your time effectively
  • Passion for entrepreneurship and a drive to continuously learn and improve


Benefits

  • Be your own boss
  • Learn how to make money from your passion and interests
  • Find a community of like minded hard working solopreneurs and entrepreneurs
  • Choose your own schedule and work when you want


We are a community that values diversity. We encourage everyone including women and people of color to join us
